feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
